00021 /*****************************************************************************/
00032 /*****************************************************************************/
00033 template <typename T>
00034 BSTree<T>::BSTree(ObjectAllocator *OA, bool ShareOA){
00035   if (ShareOA) // if the tree is to share an allocator
00036   {
00037     oa_ = OA; // use the supplied allocator
00038     freeoa_ = false; // allocator is not to be freed by this tree
00039     shareoa_ = true; // share this allocator on copying this tree
00040   }
00041   else // otherwise, tree must create its own allocator
00042   {
00043     OAConfig config(true); // set UseCPPMemManager to true, default others
00044     oa_ = new ObjectAllocator(sizeof(BinTreeNode), config);
00045 
00046     freeoa_ = true; // allocator is to be freed by this tree
00047     shareoa_ = false; // do not share this allocator with any other tree
00048   }
00049   root_ = 0;
00050   size_ = 0;
00051 }

00063 /*****************************************************************************/
00064 template <typename T>
00065 BSTree<T>::BSTree(const BSTree& rhs){
00066   if (rhs.shareoa_) // if the tree is to share an allocator
00067   {
00068     oa_ = rhs.oa_; // use the supplied allocator
00069     freeoa_ = false; // allocator is not to be freed by this tree
00070     shareoa_ = true; // share this allocator on copying this tree
00071   }
00072   else // otherwise, tree must create its own allocator
00073   {
00074     OAConfig config(true); // set UseCPPMemManager to true, default others
00075     oa_ = new ObjectAllocator(sizeof(BinTreeNode), config);
00076 
00077     freeoa_ = true; // allocator is to be freed by this tree
00078     shareoa_ = false; // do not share this allocator with any other tree
00079   }
00080   
00081   copy_tree(root_, rhs.root_);
00082   size_ = rhs.size_;
00083   // finish the copy construction
00084 }

00086 /*****************************************************************************/
00094 /*****************************************************************************/
00095 template <typename T>
00096 BSTree<T>::~BSTree(){
00097   clear();
00098   if (freeoa_) // if the allocator is to be freed by this tree
00099   {
00100     delete oa_;
00101   }
00102   // else, we are done, deleting the allocator will be handled elsewhere
00103 }

00118 template <typename T>
00119 BSTree<T>& BSTree<T>::operator=(const BSTree& rhs){
00120   // check for self-assignment
00121   if (this == &rhs)
00122     return *this;
00123 
00124   // clear the tree to assign to before assigning
00125   clear();
00126 
00127   if (rhs.shareoa_) // if the tree is to share an allocator
00128   {
00129     oa_ = rhs.oa_; // use the supplied allocator
00130     freeoa_ = false; // allocator is not to be freed by this tree
00131     shareoa_ = true; // share this allocator on copying this tree
00132   }
00133   else // otherwise, tree must create its own allocator
00134   {
00135     OAConfig config(true); // set UseCPPMemManager to true, default others
00136     oa_ = new ObjectAllocator(sizeof(BinTreeNode), config);
00137 
00138     freeoa_ = true; // allocator is to be freed by this tree
00139     shareoa_ = false; // do not share this allocator with any other tree
00140   }
00141 
00142   // do the assignment
00143   copy_tree(root_, rhs.root_);
00144   size_ = rhs.size_;
00145   
00146   return *this;
00147 }

00149 /*****************************************************************************/
00161 /*****************************************************************************/
00162 template <typename T>
00163 const typename BSTree<T>::BinTreeNode* BSTree<T>::operator[](int index) const{
00164   // if root is null, the index is out of bounds, or negative
00165   // return null
00166   if (root_ == 0 || index > static_cast<int>(size_) || index < 0)
00167     return 0;
00168   // recursively search the root subtrees looking for index
00169   const BinTreeNode* indexnode = find_index(root_, index);
00170   
00171   return indexnode;
00172 }

00174 /*****************************************************************************/
00187 /*****************************************************************************/
00188 template <typename T>
00189 const typename BSTree<T>::BinTreeNode* BSTree<T>::find_index(BinTree tree, int index) const{
00190   if (tree == 0)
00191   {
00192     return 0;
00193   }
00194 
00195   // Assume that L is the number of nodes in the left subtree.
00196   int nodesinleft = 0;
00197 
00198   if (tree->left)  
00199     nodesinleft = tree->left->count;
00200 
00201   // If the left subtree has more than i nodes (L > i), then it's in the left subtree.
00202   if (nodesinleft > index)
00203   {
00204     // Recursively call the method with the left node and the index.
00205     return find_index(tree->left, index);
00206   }
00207 
00208   // If the left subtree has less than i nodes (L < i), then it's in the right subtree.
00209   else if (nodesinleft < index)
00210   {
00211     //Recursively call the method with the right node and i - L - 1.
00212     return find_index(tree->right, index - nodesinleft - 1);
00213   }
00214 
00215   // Else the left subtree has exactly i nodes so it's in the current node.
00216   return tree;
00217 }

00263     return;
00264   free_all_nodes(root_);
00265 }

00277 /*****************************************************************************/
00278 template <typename T>
00279 void BSTree<T>::free_all_nodes(BinTree &tree){
00280   if (tree)
00281   {
00282     free_all_nodes(tree->left);
00283     free_all_nodes(tree->right);
00284     free_node(tree);
00285     tree = 0;
00286   }
00287 }

00403 /*****************************************************************************/
00404 template <typename T>
00405 typename BSTree<T>::BinTree BSTree<T>::make_node(const T& value){
00406   try
00407   {
00408     return new (oa_->Allocate())BinTreeNode(value);
00409   }
00410   catch (const OAException &e)
00411   {
00412     throw(BSTException(BSTException::E_NO_MEMORY, e.what()));
00413   }
00414 }

00427 template <typename T>
00428 void BSTree<T>::free_node(BinTree node){
00429   node->~BinTreeNode();
00430   oa_->Free(node); 
00431   size_--;
00432 }

00434 /*****************************************************************************/
00446 /*****************************************************************************/
00447 template <typename T>
00448 int BSTree<T>::tree_height(BinTree tree) const{
00449   if (tree == 0)
00450     return -1;
00451   else
00452     return (1 + max(tree_height(tree->left), tree_height(tree->right)));
00453 }

00466 /*****************************************************************************/
00467 template <typename T>
00468 void BSTree<T>::find_predecessor(BinTree tree, BinTree &predecessor) const{
00469   predecessor = tree->left;
00470   while (predecessor->right != 0)
00471     predecessor = predecessor->right;
00472 }

00474 /*****************************************************************************/
00486 /*****************************************************************************/
00487 template <typename T>
00488 bool BSTree<T>::find_node(BinTree tree, const T& value, unsigned &compares) const{
00489   ++compares;
00490   if (tree == 0)
00491     return false;
00492   else if (value == tree->data)
00493     return true;
00494   else if (value < tree->data)
00495     return find_node(tree->left, value, compares);
00496   else
00497     return find_node(tree->right, value, compares);
00498 }
00499 
00500 /*****************************************************************************/
00511 /*****************************************************************************/
00512 template <typename T>
00513 void BSTree<T>::delete_node(BinTree &tree, const T& value){
00514   if (tree == 0)
00515     return;
00516   else if (value < tree->data)
00517   {
00518     tree->count--;
00519     delete_node(tree->left, value);
00520   }
00521   else if (value > tree->data)
00522   {
00523     tree->count--;
00524     delete_node(tree->right, value);
00525   }
00526   else // (value == tree->data)
00527   {
00528     tree->count--;
00529     if (tree->left == 0)
00530     {
00531       BinTree temp = tree;
00532       tree = tree->right;
00533       free_node(temp);
00534     }
00535     else if (tree->right == 0)
00536     {
00537       BinTree temp = tree;
00538       tree = tree->left;
00539       free_node(temp);
00540     }
00541     else
00542     {
00543       BinTree pred = 0;
00544       find_predecessor(tree, pred);
00545       tree->data = pred->data;
00546       delete_node(tree->left, tree->data);
00547     }
00548   }
00549 }

00551 /*****************************************************************************/
00562 /*****************************************************************************/
00563 template <typename T>
00564 void BSTree<T>::insert_node(BinTree &tree, const T& value){
00565   if (tree == 0)
00566   {
00567     tree = make_node(value);
00568     tree->count++;
00569     size_++;
00570   }
00571   else if (value < tree->data)
00572   {
00573     tree->count++;
00574     insert_node(tree->left, value);
00575   }
00576   else
00577   {
00578     tree->count++;
00579     insert_node(tree->right, value);
00580   }
00581 }

00597 template <typename T>
00598 int BSTree<T>::max(const int first, const int second) const{
00599   if (first > second)
00600     return first;
00601   else
00602     return second;
00603 }

00605 /*****************************************************************************/
00615 /*****************************************************************************/
00616 template <typename T>
00617 void BSTree<T>::copy_tree(BinTree &copy, BinTree tree){
00618   if (tree == 0)
00619     return;
00620 
00621   copy = make_node(tree->data);
00622   copy->count = tree->count;
00623     
00624   copy_tree(copy->left, tree->left);
00625   copy_tree(copy->right, tree->right);
00626 }
